summary: REQ-27 redirect logic appears to be implemented in frontend/index.html with a reachability check and timestamped sessionStorage caching (5-minute TTL) intended to avoid a permanently-stuck "unreachable" state and to keep the draft domain usable when the canonical domain is not reachable. However, many unrelated UI/resume/theme files were also modified despite the request explicitly limiting the change to frontend/index.html redirect behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Global styling/theme overhaul (warm OKLCH palette, section utilities, smooth scrolling) unrelated to domain/redirect behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals specify no styling/layout changes unrelated to domain/redirect behavior; issue should be addressed in frontend/index.html only.

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind configuration changes (fonts, colors, shadows, animations) unrelated to redirect behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; violates constraint that the fix should be in frontend/index.html redirect behavior only.

hallucinated_features.description: Resume content/data model changes (resumeData.ts updates including personal info, experience, education, skills).
App layout/component logic changes (App.tsx and multiple layout/section components: TopNav, Section, Footer, Hero/About/Experience/Education/Skills/Projects/Contact sections).
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicit non-goals: changing section layouts or styling unrelated to domain/redirect behavior; fix should be addressed in frontend/index.html only.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state updates describing creation of a full resume website and multiple features unrelated to redirect fix.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; scope is only redirect logic in frontend/index.html.
